name: Lightning: SouthProject
description:
A 2D Raiden-type shooting game made by 'Constuct 2' free limited edition.

PLEASE TURN DOWN YOUR VOLUME!!!  (Sorry for not lowering the BGM's volume)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Co-designer: Zetong Bian & Xiangyu "Marshall" Wang

Engineer: Xiangyu "Marshall" Wang

Assets are from online free sources.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instuctions:

The in-game instructions are outdated and not translated. Sorry for that! Please refer to instuctions below:

Be careful - ONE SHOT YOU DIE!

Move: WASD

Shoot: (No need to press a key, it shoots automatically!)

Bounce Block: Left Click (Consumes 1SP)

    - All Bullets will bounce off Magic Blocks

Fire Ball: F (Consumes 30% Magic Bar)

     -  Fire Ball empowers players low-level bullets' damage and speed

     - When the player gets upgraded to high-level shots, FireBall no longer empowers the bullets, but neutralize enemies' normal bullets.

Clear Enemy Bullets: Space (Consumes 45% Magic Bar)

    - Clears all enemy bullets and prevent them from shooting for a short while

Items will drop after enemies are killed, and will be automatically absorbed by the player.
